example.text: Growth of gaal, gpi8 and gpi16 deletants, when transferred to a glucose-containing medium in order to deplete these proteins, would begin to decline at 12, 6 and 6 h , respectively, after transfer and ceased at 24, 12 and 12 h.
example.arg: growth of gaal, gpi8 and gpi16 deletants
to decline at 12, 6 and 6 h

example.text: Growth of the gpi17 deletant was believed to have probably begun declining at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium, but growth continued slowly for 33 h.
example.arg: Growth of the gpi17 deletant
declining at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium

example.text: Growth of the gpi17 deletant which has begun to decline at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium can continue slowly for 33 h.
example.arg: Growth of the gpi17 deletant
to decline at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium

example.text: Growth of the gpi17 deletant which probably began to decline at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium can continue slowly for 33 h.
example.arg: Growth of the gpi17 deletant
to decline at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium

example.text: Growth of the gpi17 deletant which probably begins to decline at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium can continue slowly for 33 h.
example.arg: Growth of the gpi17 deletant
to decline at 6 h after transfer to a glucose-containing medium
